title.en: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki no Okaa-san wa Suki desu ka?

altTitles.en: Do you like a mother whose normal attack is a double hit on all targets?
Do You Love Your Mom and Her Two-Hit Multi-Target Attacks?
The Freudian Complex of a Mother-Son Duo who 2-hit kills all in her path?

altTitles.ru: Ты же любишь мамочку, удары которой бьют по площади двойным уроном?

altTitles.zh: 通常攻击是全体攻击兼二次攻击的妈妈你喜欢吗？

altTitles.ja: 通常攻撃が全体攻撃で二回攻撃のお母さんは好きですか？

altTitles.zh-hk: 通常攻擊是全體攻擊兼二次攻擊的媽媽你喜歡嗎？

altTitles.fr: Aimez-vous votre mère et ses attaques à cibles multiples à deux coups?

altTitles.vi: Bạn có yêu mẹ mình cùng hai đòn sát thương đa mục tiêu của cô ấy?

altTitles.it: Ti piace la tua mamma e i suoi attacchi multi-bersaglio a due colpi?

altTitles.es: ¿Amas a tu madre y sus ataques de dos golpes y de múltiples objetivos?

altTitles.ru: Ко:гэки га Дзэнтаи Ко:гэки дэ ни Каи Ко:гэки но Ока:-сан ва Суки Дэсука?
Ты любишь маму, чья базовая атака — двойные удары по множественным целям?

altTitles.ar: هل تحب أمك رغم هجماتها متعددة الأهداف؟

altTitles.zh: 常攻倍二，而為備攻，是母善歟？ (Classical Chinese)
普通攻击是全体二连击，这样的妈妈你喜欢吗？

altTitles.zh-hk: 普通攻擊是全體二連擊，這樣的媽媽你喜歡嗎？

description.en:
What would you do if you got transported into a video game...with your mom?? That's the dilemma facing high schooler Masato Oosuki, who has been unwittingly thrown into an RPG world with his doting mother close behind as part of a secret government scheme. As an avid gamer, Masato is eager to show off his skills...but that's hard to do when your mom is an insanely overpowered, dual-wielding, multi-target specialist!

(Source: Yen Press)

---

description.es-la: Um adolescente é transportado para um mundo de fantasia estilo RPG… com sua mãe, e ela acaba por ser um membro da party extremamente poderosa. Seu ataque normal equivale a dois ataques com poder máximo!
